hotels.title: Thailand Khao Yai Escape with Three Onsite Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Experience the magic of Thailand's countryside at this Mövenpick jewel in Khao Yai. Blending the best of classic Thai and European-inspired design, this family-friendly retreat is home to rooms, residences and penthouses that deliver contemporary luxury at its best. Modern facilities more than match the accommodation - savour authentic cuisine at the onsite eateries or satiate your sweet tooth at the daily Chocolate Hour, a hallmark of Mövenpick resorts around the world. Rejuvenate at the Panacee Wellness Khao Yai, or keep up your fitness routine at the gym. Beyond the hotel, explore the lush Khao Yai National Park, visit the charming local vineyards, or enjoy a round of golf at the nearby courses.
